entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 08:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: WSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain beginning late this morning then changing to flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
